headline: Is Blackstone’s (BX) ESOP Stock Offering Quietly Reframing Its Private Credit And Power Ambitions?
summary: In late February 2026, Blackstone filed a shelf registration for approximately US$1.47 billion of common stock, linked to an ESOP-related offering of 12,765,875 shares. This coincided with Blackstone’s expanding role in private credit and energy infrastructure, underscoring how it continues to raise capital alongside deploying it into lending and power assets. Next, we’ll consider how this fresh equity capacity, tied to employee ownership, could influence Blackstone’s long-term investment...

headline: Is Blackstone Inc. (BX) One of the Best Cheap Blue Chip Stocks to Buy According to Analysts?
summary: Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) is one of the best cheap blue chip stocks to buy according to analysts. Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) reported on February 23 that Blackstone Life Sciences (BXLS) announced a research and development funding agreement to advance the clinical development of bleximenib, which is an investigational oral menin inhibitor, for acute myeloid leukemia (AML). […]

headline: Blackstone Reshapes Portfolio With Home Services And Hydrogen While Shares Slide
summary: Blackstone has finalized the acquisition of Champions Group, expanding its presence in home services. The firm has completed construction of the Magnolia Power Generating Station, its first hydrogen capable plant in the region. Blackstone is exploring an investment or acquisition of VoltaGrid, an energy infrastructure player. The firm is considering a sale of its clinical trials business, Nucleus Network. For investors watching NYSE:BX, these moves indicate that Blackstone is actively...

headline: Blackstone CEO Schwarzman Earns Over $1.2 Billion In 2025 Amid Record Profits
summary: Blackstone CEO Steve Schwarzman earned $1.24 billion in total compensation in 2025, slightly below his 2022 record, while the firm reported record earnings for the year.
